notes: Use for: ahdname-i hümayun (charter, unilateral treaty)
Use for: Arz; arz?; arz-ı hal (petition)
Use for: barat; berât; berât-ı şerif (diploma, patent, sultanic letter of protection, deed of grant)
Use for: buyuruldu (buyuruldu; lit. "it has been ordered," command, order, often in the name of the imperial)
Use for: Commandamento; Commandamento Regio; Sublime Commandamento
(book containing a government (colonial/diplomatic) appointee's responsibilities as administrator)
(official letters sent from Venice to its representatives in Istanbul)
Use for: ferman (sultanic decree, edict, imperial instructions of various sorts, see Williams 2009: 56)
Use for: Hükm; hüküm; hüm (sultanic decree/written directive/imperial order)
Use for: mürasela; Mürasela; Mürasele; murassele (a letter of rights by kadı)
Use for: Temessük (order, promissory note, receipt, title deed, verification document)
Use for: Tezkire (memo; record of debt; also: biography)
